name: id
description: The ID of the input.

name: name
description: The name of the input, which is submitted with the form data.

name: type
description: Type of input control to render, for example, a password input control. Defaults to `"text"`.

name: inputmode
description: Optional value for [the inputmode attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/inputmode).

name: value
description: Optional initial value of the input.

name: disabled
description: If `true`, input will be disabled.

name: describedBy
description: One or more element IDs to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute, used to provide additional descriptive information for screenreader users.

name: label
description: The label used by the text input component.

name: hint
description: Can be used to add a hint to a text input component.

name: errorMessage
description: Can be used to add an error message to the text input component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

name: prefix
description: Can be used to add a prefix to the text input component.

params.name: text
params.description: Required. If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the prefix. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: Required. If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the prefix. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the prefix.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the prefix element.

name: suffix
description: Can be used to add a suffix to the text input component.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the suffix. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the suffix. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the suffix element.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the suffix element.

name: formGroup
description: Additional options for the form group containing the text input component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (for example to show error state for the whole group).

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the form group.

params.name: beforeInput
params.description: Content to add before the input used by the text input component.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add before the input. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add before the input. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: afterInput
params.description: Content to add after the input used by the text input component.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add after the input. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add after the input. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the input.

name: autocomplete
description: Attribute to meet [WCAG success criterion 1.3.5: Identify input purpose](https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG22/Understanding/identify-input-purpose.html), for instance `"bday-day"`. See the [Autofill section in the HTML standard](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/form-control-infrastructure.html#autofill) section in the HTML standard for full list of attributes that can be used.

name: pattern
description: Attribute to [provide a regular expression pattern](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/input.html#the-pattern-attribute), used to match allowed character combinations for the input value.

name: spellcheck
description: Optional field to enable or disable the `spellcheck` attribute on the input.

name: autocapitalize
description: Optional field to enable or disable autocapitalisation of user input. [See the Autocapitalization section in the HTML spec](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/interaction.html#autocapitalization) for a full list of values that can be used.

name: inputWrapper
description: If any of `prefix`, `suffix`, `formGroup.beforeInput` or `formGroup.afterInput` have a value, a wrapping element is added around the input and inserted content. This object allows you to customise that wrapping element.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the wrapping element.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the wrapping element.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the input.
